overview: She lives an ordinary life — work, home, TV, him. One day, as usual, she returns home, to him, always eating and watching TV. Tired of such a life, she tries to talk to him, to tell him that she is very lonely, but she runs into misunderstanding and laughter. Enough for her. She, without thinking twice, brutally kills him. In the midst of the murder, the doorbell rings…
title: TV-set
